title: Ex-Google tech worker is convicted of economic spying to benefit China
description: A federal jury has convicted a former Google tech engineer of economic espionage and theft of confidential artificial intelligence technology as part of a scheme to benefit China.
content:
A federal jury has convicted a former Google tech engineer of economic espionage and theft of confidential artificial intelligence technology as part of a scheme to benefit China, federal justice officials announced on Thursday.

title: Trump administration clashes with Claude-maker Anthropic over AI’s use in weapons: Report
description: In a rare confrontation with the Silicon Valley, the Donald Trump administration of the United States has clashed with artificial intelligence (AI) company Anthropic over the usage of its technology in weapons and surveillance of citizens, according to a report.
content:

title: Staff training the key to companies unlocking productivity potential of AI, EY finds
description: Survey suggests growing gap between artificial intelligence investment and return seen by companies
content:
Employers are failing to achieve the full benefit of their investment in artificial intelligence (AI) because their staff are not sufficiently trained to exploit the technology, research by international professional services firm EY suggests.
